verses.text: \w Now|strong="H3117"\w* \w these|strong="H1696"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w generations|strong="H8435"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*.

\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* first-born \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w mine|strong="H3478"\w*; \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* first-born \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w hallowed|strong="H6942"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5221"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* first-born \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w both|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* beast; \w mine|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.
